title: The Problem with Buying Stock in Logan Paul (BitClout)
description:
Thanks to Notion for sponsoring this episode! Sign up for Notion here: http://bit.ly/colinsamirnotion​
Today on the show we're talking about BitClout, the decentralized crypto social network that allows you to buy "stock" or coins in your favorite creators.
